Salesforce Components - FieldMappingSelector
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class FieldMappingSelector

public inherited sharing class FieldMappingSelector

Retrieve field mappings from the custom metadata object.


Change History

  • 07/11/2021   Initial version.
  • 07/13/2021   getFieldSet(): Support for negative numbers.
  • 02/23/2023   getFieldSet(): Add support for Hash__c field.
  • 08/29/2024   getFieldSetAsMap(): Method to get field mappings as a map.

Group:
    Selector Classes

public static List<FieldMap>
getFieldSet(String fieldSet)
Method to get a list of field mappings.
public static Map<String, FieldMap>

Method to get field mappings as a map.

Methods

public static List<FieldMap> getFieldSet(String fieldSet)

Method to get a list of field mappings.

Parameters:
    fieldSet – The field set to retrieve as a list.

Returns:
    The list of field mappings.

Since:
    07/11/2021

public static Map<String, FieldMap> getFieldSetAsMap(String fieldSet)

Method to get field mappings as a map.

Parameters:
    fieldSet – The field set to retrieve as a map.

Returns:
    The map of field mappings.

Since:
    08/29/2024
